name: MigrateDatabaseVersion
description: Migrate database version with up/down sripts in migration directories
author: Starschema Ltd

inputs.name: cwd
inputs.label: Directory containing migrations
inputs.helpMarkDown: The directory containing the migrations.  Empty is the root of the repo (build) or artifacts (release), which is $(System.DefaultWorkingDirectory)

inputs.name: upSqlName
inputs.label: Migration sql file name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the file that contains the SQL scripts that are ran when the migration is applied

inputs.name: downSqlName
inputs.label: Revert sql file name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the file that contains the SQL scripts that are ran when the migration is reverted

inputs.name: server
inputs.label: SQL Server host name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The SQL Server host URL without port. Example: my-db.com or my-db\instance

inputs.name: user
inputs.label: Username
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the user to use to log in

inputs.name: password
inputs.label: Password
inputs.helpMarkDown: The password to use to log in

inputs.name: encrypt
inputs.label: Encrypt (true required for Azure databases)
inputs.helpMarkDown: Check to encrypt the communication with the database

inputs.name: migrationTableName
inputs.label: Migration table name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the SQL table that contains the migration information
